title: Hot Springs National Park: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility      The Visitor Center in the Fordyce Bathhouse is fully accessible. Parking is across the street in public lots or streetside. There is a model of Bathhouse Row in the visitor center. We can provide an American Sign Language interpreter for regularly scheduled tours with seven days notice. Gulpha Gorge Campground has one accessible campsite and accessible rest rooms. The park store, Bathhouse Row Emporium, in the Lamar Bathhouse is accessible. You can get an America the Beautiful Access Pass for individuals with a disability at the store. Download more information here.
